question: Which of the following is correct with respect to “Right against exploitation”?
option1: Prohibition of traffic in human beings and forced labour
option2: Freedom as to payment of taxes for the promotion of any particular religion
answer: Prohibition of traffic in human beings and forced labour
explanation: The right against exploitation prohibits all forms of forced labour, child labour and trafficking of human beings. The right to constitutional remedies is present for enforcement of Fundamental Rights.
